titleInfo.title: Open Source Hardware files of tacTiles/SonicChair

mods.abstract:
## Supplementary Material for Building your own tacTiles
+ [CAD-Files](https://pub.uni-bielefeld.de/download/2761273/2761277) (in [Siemens Solid Edge](http://www.plm.automation.siemens.com/en_us/products/velocity/solidedge/index.shtml) format, or as [image](https://pub.uni-bielefeld.de/download/2761273/2761276)). + [Schematic](https://pub.uni-bielefeld.de/download/2761273/2761283) and [PCB-Layout](https://pub.uni-bielefeld.de/download/2761273/2761282) file of electronics (in [Cadsoft Eagle](http://www.cadsoft.de/) format or as images - [Schematic](https://pub.uni-bielefeld.de/download/2761273/2761280), [PCB-Layout](https://pub.uni-bielefeld.de/download/2761273/2761274)). + PIC18F458 Microcontroller code as [MPLAB C18 source](https://pub.uni-bielefeld.de/download/2761273/2761279) and as [compiled binary](https://pub.uni-bielefeld.de/download/2761273/2761281). + [Bill-of-Materials](https://pub.uni-bielefeld.de/download/2761273/2761275) + Dissassembled tacTiles images: [sensors for the back](https://pub.uni-bielefeld.de/download/2761273/2761278), [backside of the mat](https://pub.uni-bielefeld.de/download/2761273/2761286).
